snippet: Gov. Christine Gregoire pledged to sign the measure next week, but a final decision may come down to a voter referendum.
abstract: Washington State House of Representatives gives final passage to a bill allowing same-sex couples to marry, poising state to become the seventh to allow such unions; Gov Christine Gregoire has pledged to sign the bill.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Christine Gregoire pledged to sign the measure next week, but a final decision may come down to a voter referendum.

headline.seo: Washington State Moves Closer to Gay Marriage
headline.main: Vote Moves Washington State Closer to Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: House Vote Moves Washington State Closer to Gay Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
